image.title: IBS
image.description: a leader in Enterprise Java Solutions with emphasis on Higher Education.

item.title: IBS Releases Student Affairs 1.6
item.description: IBS is pleased to announce release 1.6 of IBS Student Affairs. This new incremental release of our product is designed to greatly improve the performance of the program.

item.title: IBS Releases Enterprise Java Framework 0.8
item.description: The IBS Enterprise Java Framework (EJF) provides tools and methods for companies that wish to build secure business applications, which make use of distributed-object computing and standard Internet technologies...

item.title: IBS releases Distributed Message Agent Server 7.5
item.description: IBS today announced the new version of its Distributed Message Agent Server (DMAS) for extremely scalable, fault-tolerant connectivity to PeopleSoft applications
